Package com.microsoft.rest.v3.util

Class FluxUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.rest.v3.util.FluxUtil
  • public final class FluxUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains helper methods, types for dealing with Flux.

        public static boolean isFluxByteBuf​(java.lang.reflect.Type entityType)
        Checks if a type is Flux<ByteBuf>.
        Parameters:
        entityType - the type to check
        Returns:
        whether the type represents a Flux that emits ByteBuf

      • collectBytesInByteBufStream

        public static reactor.core.publisher.Mono<byte[]> collectBytesInByteBufStream​(reactor.core.publisher.Flux<io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf> stream,
                                                                              boolean autoReleaseEnabled)
        Collects ByteBuf emitted by a Flux into a byte array.
        Parameters:
        stream - A stream which emits ByteBuf instances.
        autoReleaseEnabled - if ByteBuf instances in stream gets automatically released as they consumed
        Returns:
        A Mono which emits the concatenation of all the ByteBuf instances given by the source Flux.

      • split

        public static reactor.core.publisher.Flux<io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf> split​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf whole,
                                                                         int chunkSize)
        Splits a ByteBuf into ByteBuf chunks.
        Parameters:
        whole - the ByteBuf to split
        chunkSize - the maximum size of each ByteBuf chunk
        Returns:
        A stream that emits chunks of the original whole ByteBuf

      • byteBufToArray

        public static byte[] byteBufToArray​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf byteBuf)
        Gets the content of the provided ByteBuf as a byte array. This method will create a new byte array even if the ByteBuf can have optionally backing array.
        Parameters:
        byteBuf - the byte buffer
        Returns:
        the byte array

                                                                                        boolean autoReleaseEnabled)
        Collects byte buffers emitted by a Flux into a ByteBuf.
        Parameters:

        autoReleaseEnabled - if ByteBuf instances in stream gets automatically released as they consumed

      • byteBufStreamFromFile

        public static reactor.core.publisher.Flux<io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf> byteBufStreamFromFile​(java.nio.channels.AsynchronousFileChannel fileChannel,
                                                                                         int chunkSize,
                                                                                         long offset,
                                                                                         long length)
        Creates a Flux from an AsynchronousFileChannel which reads part of a file into chunks of the given size.
        Parameters:
        fileChannel - The file channel.
        chunkSize - the size of file chunks to read.
        offset - The offset in the file to begin reading.
        length - The number of bytes to read from the file.
        Returns:
        the Flowable.
